About

This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: jglovier / jekyll-new

You can find the source code for Jekyll at jekyll / jekyll

My journey of photography began when my dad bought me my first camera. I love photography and believe its more about the perspective to look at things in a new beautiful ways than gear and techniques.

Currently I am pursuing my master's in Computer Science at University of Nebraska, Lincoln. My specialization is Bioinformatics using advanced database techniques

If you are a F.R.I.E.N.D.S person, then you pretty much know the type of person I am. Jennifer Anniston has been my role model. Apart from this, I love to travel, enjoy the nature, sleep and ofcourse photography.

Drop me a line, if you wanna know more about me.
